report.rawcontent: all plots 10-Sep-97 : B : Gallup at 6.0 1 in 200 2. 31-Oct-97 : B : Sludges applied as treatment. 31-Mar-98 : B : Muriate of potash at 120 kg. 34.5% N at 145 kg. 03-Apr-98 : T : SLUDGE. T21: Triple superphosphate at 64 kg. 27% N at 370 kg. 3 . 08-May-98 : B : PDQ at 9.0 i in 2001. . 12-May-98 : B : Raked. Mixed ryegrass broadcast at 40 kg. Raked. 05-Oct-98 : B : Cut.

all plots 22-Dec-98 : B : : Raked. Broadcast Riband, tr. Beret Gold, at 600 seeds/m by hand. Raked. 19-Mar-99 : B : : Raked. The w. wheat failed and was resown to s. wheat. Broadcast Chablis, tr. Sibutol, at 330 seeds/m2 by hand. Raked. 29-Apr-99 : B : : Muriate of potash at 167 kg. 27% N at 630 kg. 07-May-99 : B : : Ally at 30 g in 200 1. 5 20-Aug-99 : B : : Hand harvested.

all plots 28-Aug-99 : B : : Alpha Glyphogan at 3.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Sep-99 : B : : Hand dug and raked. 01-Oct-99 : B : : tm)PDO at 3.01 in 2001. : B : : tm)Enhance Low Foam at 100 ml in 200 1. 13-Oct-99 : B : : Hand raked. Broadcast Cotswold ryegrass Mix A at 40 kg. Rolled. 12-Nov-99 : B : : Spannit at 1.5 1 in 100 1. 25-Peb-00 : B : : Muriate of potash at 100 kg. 34.5% N at 116 kg. 19-Mar-00 : B : : Legumex Extra at 7.0 1 in 200 1. 07-Apr-00 : B : : Broadcast Danergo and Ligrane ryegrass 50:50 mix at 100 kg. 1l-Apr-00 : B : : 27.0% N at 407 kg. 14-Jun-00 : B : : Cut. 17-Jul-00 : B : : Azural at 4.0 1 in 200 1. 28-Jul-00 : B : : Topped.
